rule: The next line must begin with the label "People names:" followed by a list of people names extracted from the input text in a comma-separated format.
input: Marie Curie and Albert Einstein revolutionized science.
coverage:
Company names: 
People names: Marie Curie, Albert Einstein
Specific topics: science, revolutionized science
General themes: scientific breakthroughs, historical figures in science
validityText:
The input "Marie Curie and Albert Einstein revolutionized science." is a single sentence string containing a passage of text. 

- The specification requires that the input must be a string (which it is).
- It can include names of people (Marie Curie and Albert Einstein are names of people).
- It can include specific topics (science is a specific topic).

The input meets all the requirements set out by the input specification. There are no elements of the input that violate the specification guidelines. 

No violation.

OK
